title: If there had been a (non-human) intelligent civilisation on earth before us, would we know? - Quora

response.answer_text: Their still is advanced Et’s that live below the surface of the earth with advanced transport links 3000 mph, they have underground cities and are known as the watchers of humanity. They are incredibly more advanced than humans and they can not live on the surface because we are aggressive, dangerous and violent. They are loving and peaceful but they are not impressed with our ways and what we are doing to this planet. They can not interfere with our progress unless nuclear weapons were deployed they can and will deactivate them..They are the ones been seen flying UFO’s all over our planet, they can scan anything and know whats going on.
Yes. Please use the search function on Quora before asking questions like this. You will find dozens of complete answers.
